snippet: Tony Bennett wanted to see his Virginia team come through in a close game when not everything went right. Across the country right before Christmas and the start of conference play, California provided the perfect test while trying to protect a sc...
lead_paragraph: Tony Bennett wanted to see his Virginia team come through in a close game when not everything went right. Across the country right before Christmas and the start of conference play, California provided the perfect test while trying to protect a school-record home winning streak.

headline.main: No. 12 Virginia Uses Big Second Half, Holds Off Cal 56-52
headline.print_headline: No. 12 Virginia Uses Big Second Half, Holds Off Cal 56-52
